column1: Injected into SEO friendly layered navigation URLs to indicate that filter shows all items.
column2: Injected into SEO friendly layered navigation URLs to indicate that filter shows all items.

column1: In case filter has more than specified number of items, only first items are displayed, as well as 'Show More' and 'Show Less' actions.
column2: In case filter has more than specified number of items, only first items are displayed, as well as 'Show More' and 'Show Less' actions.

column1: If enabled, all filter items are preloaded, 'Show More' and 'Show Less' actions do not reload the page and are very fast.
column2: If enabled, all filter items are preloaded, 'Show More' and 'Show Less' actions do not reload the page and are very fast.

column1: Applied to 'Show More' and 'Show Less' actions when 'Preload All Items' parameter is enabled.
